tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The annual US-GAAP Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The 2024 U.S. Financial Reporting Taxonomy (Taxonomy) contains updates for accounting standards and other improvements since the 2023 Taxonomy as used by issuers filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All components and five related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, EXCH
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes ALL components for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy. Five related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, and EXCH.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All components except for doc, -chg-, and ref linkbases. Includes three related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, COUNTRY, CURRENCY.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes all components for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy except for document, change, and reference linkbases. Four related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, COUNTRY, and CURRENCY.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements, Labels, Documentation, References, Deprecated presentations, Deprecated mapping, Change notes, Implementation notes, Implementation note relatioships)
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the elements for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy with their standard, period start, period end, total, axis default, and documentation labels. It also include references. It does not include presentation, calculation, or definition linkbases. Five related SEC Taxonomies are imported - DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, and EXCH. This entry point also includes the following non industry/statement and non disclosure presentation and definition linkbases: 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (presentation) 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (definition). This entry pint also includes Change notes, Implementation notes, and Implementation note relationships

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements, Labels, Documentation, References, Deprecated presentations, Deprecated mapping, SEC DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, EXCH Imports
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the elements for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy with their standard, period start, period end, total, axis default, and documentation labels. It also include references. It does not include presentation, calculation, or definition linkbases. Five related SEC Taxonomies are imported - DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, and EXCH. This entry point also includes the following non industry/statement and non disclosure presentation and definition linkbases: 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (presentation) 999000 - Deprecated - Deprecated Concepts (definition)

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Elements only
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the schema file (elements) for the US GAAP Financial Reporting Taxonomy.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: All Employee Benefit Plan (EBP) components and five related SEC Taxonomies - DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, EXCH
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes ALL components for the US GAAP EBP Financial Reporting Taxonomy. Five related SEC Taxonomies are also imported - DEI, COUNTRY, STPR, CURRENCY, and EXCH.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: EBP Elements only
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the schema file (elements) for the US GAAP EBP Financial Reporting Taxonomy.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: XBRL US DQC Rules Taxonomy
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the DQC Rules Taxonomy (DQCRT).

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Meta Model Taxonomy
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes the DQC Rules Taxonomy.
